00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef PIZ_ARRAY_POOL_H
00043 #define PIZ_ARRAY_POOL_H
00044 
00045 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00048 #include "pizTypes.h"
00049 #include "pizLinklist.h"
00050 #include "pizGrowingArray.h"
00051 
00052 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 
00055 #include <pthread.h>
00056 
00057 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00060 /**
00061  * \remark  Implemented with a linklist.
00062  * \warning It is currently a very simple approach, and should be improved ;
00063  *          If an array is not released, the pool will grow dramatically for each query.
00064  * \ingroup arrayPool
00065  */
00066  
00067 typedef struct _PIZArrayPool {
00068     pthread_mutex_t     lock;                       /* POSIX mutex. */
00069     long                retain;                     /* Number of arrays in use. */
00070     long                initArraySize;              /* Memory size of the new arrays. */
00071     PIZGrowingArray     *cache;                     /* Pointer to the last array delivered. */
00072     PIZLinklist         *pool;                      /* Pointer to the pool's linklist. */
00073     } PIZArrayPool;
00074 
00075 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * \brief   Create the pool of dynamic arrays.
00082  * \details The function accepts two arguments : the number of pre-allocated arrays (default is 2)
00083  *          and the size of the memory to initialize them. 
00084  *          In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00085  * \param   argc The number of arguments.
00086  * \param   argv A pointer to arguments.
00087  * \return  A pointer to the new pool of dynamic arrays.
00088  * \remark  The following shows how to create a pool of dynamic arrays.  
00089  * \code
00090  * long            args[2] = {4, 32};
00091  * PIZArrayPool    *pool = NULL;
00092  *
00093  * pool = pizArrayPoolNew (2, args);  
00094  * pool = pizArrayPoolNew (0, NULL);  // default values.
00095  *
00096  * \endcode
00097  * \ingroup arrayPool
00098  */
00099 PIZArrayPool *pizArrayPoolNew (long argc, long *argv);
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * \brief   Free the pool of dynamic arrays.
00103  * \details It is safe to pass NULL pointer. 
00104  * \param   x A Pointer.
00105  * \ingroup arrayPool
00106  */
00107 void pizArrayPoolFree (PIZArrayPool *x);
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * \brief   Get a dynamic array.
00111  * \details In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00112  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00113  * \return  A pointer to the dynamic array.
00114  * \ingroup arrayPool
00115  */
00116 PIZGrowingArray *pizArrayPoolGetArray (PIZArrayPool *x);
00117 
00118 /**
00119  * \brief   Release a dynamic array.
00120  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00121  * \param   a A pointer to the dynamic array.
00122  * \return  An error code.
00123  * \ingroup arrayPool
00124  */
00125 PIZError pizArrayPoolReleaseArray (PIZArrayPool *x, PIZGrowingArray *a);
00126 
00127 PIZ_END_C_LINKAGE
00128 
00129 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 #endif // PIZ_ARRAY_POOL_H
